Name: Ashardalon's Lair
Rule:
Place the Ashardalon figure on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.

Name: Corrupted Guardians
Rule:
Place the Gauth figure on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. If the Monster is not an Aberrant, discard once and draw again. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first. To specify which Monster Cards were picked by this Chamber, put a Shield marker on the Monster Card as a reminder.
Goal: Destroy all of the Monsters in this chamber.

Name: Duergar Garrison
Rule:
Place the Duergar Captain figure on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.

Name: Elite Regiment
Rule: Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. If the Monster is worth 1 experence, discard once and draw again. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first. To specify which Monster Cards were placed by this Chamber, put a Shield marker on the Monster Card as a reminder.
Goal: Destroy all of the Monsters in this chamber!

Name: Endless Horde
Rule:
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.
Then, each player draws and places a second Monster.
To specify which Monster Cards were placed by this Chamber, put a Shield marker on the Monster Card as a reminder.
Goal: Destroy all the Monsters in this chamber.

Name: Evil Altar Chamber
Rule:
Place the Altar marker on any Chamber tile.
The Altar has 5 HP and AC 12.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.

Name: Gate Ceremony
Rule:
Place the Vast Gate Ritual marker with 5 time tokens on any Chamber tile. The Vast Gate has 5 HP and AC 12.
Find the Ceremony Progresses! Adventure Encounter Card. Place it on top of the Encounter Deck.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.
Goal: Destroy the Vast Gate before all 5 Time tokens are removed!

Name: Kobold Clan Lair
Rule:
Place the Kobold Dragonlord on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. If the Monster is not a Reptile, discard once and draw again. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.

Name: Orc Clan Lair
Rule:
Place the Orc Storm Shaman on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. If the Monster is not an Animal or an Orc, discard once and draw again. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.

Name: Prison Guard
Rule:
Each player draws a Villager card and places the token on any Chamber tile.
Place the Duergar Captain on the Chamber Entrance tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first. To specify which Monster Cards were placed by this Chamber, put a Shield marker on the Monster Card as a reminder.
Goal: Destroy all of the Monsters before all Villagers are killed!

Name: Refuse Pit
Rule:
Place the Tunnel Exit tile next to any unexplored edge of the Chamber.
Place the Otyugh on the Chamber Entrance tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. If the Monster is not an Aberrant, discard once and draw again. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.
Goal: Destroy the Otyugh and escape through the Tunnel Exit!

Name: Stables
Rule:
Place the Rage Drake on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. If the Monster is not an Animal or a Reptile, discard once and draw again. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.

Name: Treasure Hoard
Rule:
Place 1 Treasure token on each scorch mark on each Chamber tile.
Find the Ashardalon Arrives! Adventure Encounter Card. Shuffle it with the top 3 cards of the Encounter Deck and place the 4 cards back on top of the Encounter Deck.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.
Goal: Escape from the dungeon with Treasure tokens worth at least 2,000 gold!

Name: Unknown Overlord
Rule:
Find all the Monster tokens that specify a Villain. Shuffle those tokens, then draw one. Place the specified Villain on any Chamber tile.
Starting with the active Hero, each player draws a Monster Card and places a Monster on a Chamber tile. Place Monsters on tiles that have no Monsters first.
